Verses: 1 ivaigalukkuppinbu, Raajaavaagiya Agaasveruvin Ukkiram Thanindhapodhu, Avan Vasthiyaiyum Aval Seydhadhaiyum Avalaikkuriththuth Theermaanikkappattadhaiyum Ninaiththaan.
2 appozhudhu Raajaavai Sevikkira Avanudaiya Oozhiyakkaarar Avanai Nokki: Roobavadhigalaayirukkira Kannippengalai Raajaavukkaagath Thedavendum.

3 adharkaaga Raajaa Thammudaiya Raajyaththin Naadugalilellaam Visaarippukkaararai Vaikkavendum; Ivargal Roobavadhigalaayirukkira Sagala Kannippengalaiyum Kootti, Soosaan Aramanaiyilirukkira Kannimaadaththukku Azhaiththuvandhu, Sthreegalaik Kaavalpannugira Raajaavin Pradhaaniyaagiya Yegaayin Vasaththile Oppuvikkavendum; Avargaludaiya Suththigarippukku Vendiyavaigal Avargalukkuk Kodukkappadavendum.
4 appozhudhu Raajaavin Kangalukkup Piriyamaana Kanni Vasthikkup Padhilaagap Pattaththu Sthreeyaagavendum Endraargal; Indha Vaarththai Raajaavukku Nalamaaith Thondrinapadiyaal Appadiye Seydhaan.
5 appozhudhu Soosaan Aramanaiyile Benyameeniyanaagiya Keesin Kumaaran Seemeyinudaiya Maganaagiya Yaaveerin Kumaaran Mordhegaai Ennum Perulla Oru Yoodhan Irundhaan.

6 avan Baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Ekoniyaavaip Pidiththukkondu Pogirapodhu, Avanodekooda Erusalemilirundhu Pidiththukkondu Pogappattavargalil Oruvanaayirundhaan.

7 avan Than Siriya Thagappan Kumaaraththiyaagiya Esthar Ennum Adhsaalai Valarththaan; Avalukkuth Thaaithagappanillai; Andhap Pen Roobavadhiyum Sowndhariyamudaiyavalumaayirundhaal; Aval Thagappanum Aval Thaayum Maranamadaindhapodhu, Mordhegaai Avalaith Than Kumaaraththiyaaga Eduththukkondaan.

8 raajaavin Kattalaiyum Theermaanamum Prasiththamaagi, Anegam Pengal Koottappattu, Soosaan Aramanaiyilulla Yegaayin Vasaththil Oppuvikkappadugirapodhu, Estharum Raajaavin Aramanaikku Azhaiththukkondupogappattu, Sthreegalaik Kaavalpannugira Yegaayin Vasaththil Oppuvikkappattaal.

9 andhap Pen Avan Paarvaikku Nandraayirundhadhinaal, Avalukku Avan Kangalile Dhayaikidaiththadhu; Aagaiyaal Avaludaiya Suththigarippukku Vendiyavaigalaiyum, Avalukkuth Thevaiyaana Matravaigalaiyum Avalukkuk Kodukkavum, Raaja Aramanaiyilirukkira Ezhu Thaadhimaargalai Avalukku Niyamikkavum Jaakkiradhaippattu Kannimaadaththil Sirandha Oru Idaththile Avalaiyum Aval Thaadhimaargalaiyum Vaiththaan.
10 estharovendraal Than Kulaththaiyum, Than Poorvoththaraththaiyum Arivikkaadhirundhaal; Mordhegaai Adhaith Therivikkavendaamendru Avalukkuk Karpiththirundhaan.
11 estharudaiya Sugaseydhiyaiyum Avalukku Nadakkunkaariyaththaiyum Ariya Mordhegaai Naadorum Kannimaadaththu Mutraththukku Munbaaga Ulaavuvaan.

12 ovvoru Pennum Aarumaadham Vellaippolath Thailaththinaalum, Aarumaadham Sugandhavarkkangalinaalum, Sthreegalukkuriya Matra Suththigarippugalinaalum Jodikkappadugira Naatkal Niraiveri, Ivvidhamaai Sthreegalin Muraimaippadi Pannirandu Maadhamaaga Seyyappattuth Theerndhapinbu, Raajaavaagiya Agaasveruvinidaththil Pravesikka, Avalavaludaiya Murai Varugirapodhu,
13 ippadi Jodikkappatta Pen Raajaavinidaththil Pravesippaal; Kannimaadaththilirundhu Thannodekooda Raaja Aramanaikkuppoga, Aval Thanakku Vendumendru Ketpavaiyellaam Avalukkuk Kodukkappadum.

14 saayankaalaththile Aval Ulle Pravesiththu, Kaalame, Abimaana Sthreegalaik Kaavalpannugira Raajaavin Pradhaaniyaagiya Saaskaasudaiya Visaarippukkullirukkira Sthreegalin Irandaam Maadaththukkuth Thirumbivaruvaal; Raajaa Thannai Virumbip Persolli Azhaippiththaalozhiya Aval Orupodhum Raajaavinidaththil Pravesikkakkoodaadhu.

15 mordhegaai Thanakkuk Kumaaraththiyaai Etrukkondavalum, Avan Siriyathagappanaagiya Abiyaayelin Kumaaraththiyumaana Esthar Raajaavinidaththil Pravesikkiradharku Muraivandhapodhu, Aval Sthreegalaik Kaavalpannugira Raajaavin Pradhaaniyaagiya Yegaai Niyamiththa Kaariyameyallaamal Verondrum Ketkavillai; Estharukkuth Thannaik Kaangira Ellaar Kangalilum Dhayai Kidaiththadhu.
16 appadiye Esthar Raajaavaagiya Agaasveru Arasaalugira Ezhaam Varusham Thebedh Maadhamaagiya Paththaam Maadhaththile Raajaavinidaththil Aramanaikku Azhaiththukkondu Pogappattaal.

17 raajaa Sagala Sthreegalaippaarkkilum Estharmel Anbuvaiththaan; Sagala Kannigaigalaippaarkkilum Avalukku Avan Samugaththil Adhiga Dhayaiyum Patchamum Kidaiththadhu; Aagaiyaal Avan Raajagreedaththai Aval Sirasinmel Vaiththu, Avalai Vasthiyin Sthaanaththile Pattaththu Sthreeyaakkinaan.

18 appozhudhu Raajaa Thannudaiya Ellaap Prabukkalukkum Oozhiyakkaararukkum, Estharinimiththam Oru Periya Virundhuseydhu, Naadugalukku Salakkaranai Undaakki, Raajasthidhikkuththakka Vegumaanangalaik Koduththaan.
19 irandaandharam Kannigaigal Serkkappadumpodhu, Mordhegaai Raajaavin Aramanai Vaasalil Utkaarndhirundhaan.

20 esthar Mordhegaai Thanakkuk Karpiththirundhapadi, Than Poorvoththaraththaiyum Than Kulaththaiyum Therivikkaadhirundhaal; Esthar Mordhegaai Idaththile Valarumpodhu Avan Sorkettu Nadandhadhupola, Ippozhudhum Avan Sorkettu Nadandhuvandhaal.

21 annaatkalil Mordhegaai Raajaavin Aramanai Vaasalil Utkaarndhirukkirapodhu, Vaasalkaakkira Raajaavin Irandu Pradhaanigalaagiya Pikdhaanum Theresum Varmam Vaiththu, Raajaavaagiya Agaasveruvinmel Kaipoda Vagaithedinaargal.
22 indhak Kaariyam Mordhegaaikkuth Theriyavandhadhinaal, Avan Adhai Raajaaththiyaagiya Estharukku Ariviththaan; Esthar Mordhegaayin Peraal Adhai Raajaavukku Sonnaal.

23 andhak Kaariyam Visaarikkappadugirapodhu, Adhu Meyyendru Kaanappattadhu; Aagaiyaal Avargal Iruvarum Maraththile Thookkippodappattaargal; Idhu Raaja Samugaththile Naalaagamappusthagaththile Ezhudhappattirukkiradhu.
